title: Build Bluestone Bank Mobile Dashboard with Tagline and Reference Layout

requirements.text: Rebuild the Dashboard page to match the mobile banking layout shown in the reference image: a sticky top bar with a hamburger menu icon on the left, 'Bluestone Bank' branding text with the tagline 'Solid Foundation, Secure Funds' centered beneath it, and a notification bell icon with a red badge count on the right. The top bar background should use the existing dark navy/blue theme.

quotes: add Solid Foundation, Secure Funds under the bluestone bank as a motton
let us get the building started

acceptanceCriteria: Top bar displays hamburger menu icon on the left
Top bar shows 'Bluestone Bank' as the primary brand name
Tagline 'Solid Foundation, Secure Funds' appears directly beneath 'Bluestone Bank' in a smaller, lighter font
Notification bell icon with a red numeric badge appears on the right of the top bar
Top bar uses the dark navy/blue color scheme

requirements.text: Add a hero balance card directly below the top bar. The card should display a personalized greeting such as 'Hello, [User Name]', a 'Your Balance' label with the live balance amount in large bold text fetched from the backend, and an 'Available Balance' label below it. Style the card with a blue gradient background matching the reference image.

quotes: Balance card: Greeting with user's name, current balance, and available balance

acceptanceCriteria: Card displays a personalized greeting using the authenticated user's profile name
Balance amount is fetched live from the backend via the existing balance hook
Card shows 'Your Balance' label above the amount and 'Available Balance' label below
Card has a blue gradient background consistent with the reference image style

requirements.text: Add a horizontal row of four circular quick-action buttons below the balance card: Transfer, Deposit, Withdraw, and Pay Bills. Each button should have a white circular icon background and a label below it. Tapping Transfer, Deposit, or Withdraw navigates to the respective existing page routes. Pay Bills shows a Coming Soon toast. Lay them out evenly spaced in a single row.

quotes: Quick actions: Transfer, Deposit, Withdraw, and Pay Bills buttons

acceptanceCriteria: Four circular icon buttons displayed in a single horizontal row: Transfer, Deposit, Withdraw, Pay Bills
Transfer navigates to the /transfer route
Deposit navigates to the /deposit route
Withdraw navigates to the /withdraw route
Pay Bills shows a Coming Soon toast notification
Buttons are evenly spaced and visually consistent with the reference image

requirements.text: Add a Recent Transactions section below the quick actions. It should display up to 5 of the most recent transactions, each showing a category icon, transaction name, relative date such as Yesterday or 2 Days Ago, and the amount right-aligned. Positive amounts are shown in green with a plus prefix and negative amounts in red with a minus prefix. Use the existing useTransactions hook to fetch data. Show skeleton loaders while loading and an empty state if no transactions exist.

quotes: Recent Transactions: A list showing transaction name, date, and amount (positive in green, negative in red)

acceptanceCriteria: Section has a bold 'Recent Transactions' heading
Up to 5 most recent transactions are displayed
Each row shows an icon, transaction name, relative date, and right-aligned amount
Credit amounts are green with a plus prefix and debit amounts are red with a minus prefix
Skeleton loaders shown while data is loading
Empty state message shown if no transactions exist

requirements.text: Add a fixed bottom navigation bar with four tabs: Home with a house icon, Accounts with a card icon, Payments with a dollar icon, and More with a three-dot icon. The active tab should be highlighted in white or accent color. The Home tab navigates to the dashboard. Accounts and Payments tabs show a Coming Soon toast if no dedicated route exists. The bottom nav must not overlap main content.

quotes: Bottom navigation: Home, Accounts, Payments, and More tabs

acceptanceCriteria: Fixed bottom navigation bar is visible on the dashboard
Four tabs rendered: Home, Accounts, Payments, More each with an icon and label
Active tab is visually highlighted
Home tab navigates to the dashboard route
Accounts and Payments tabs show a Coming Soon toast if no route exists
Main content has sufficient bottom padding so nothing is hidden behind the nav bar

requirements.text: Update the Dashboard page to use a mobile-first self-contained layout without the generic Layout header and footer wrapper. The page should be max-width constrained and centered. The top section containing the top bar and balance card uses a blue/navy background. The content section below uses a white or light grey background with rounded top corners, matching the card-on-blue-header style from the reference image.

quotes: something like this just use this format

acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard does not use the generic Layout component header and footer
Top section has a blue/navy background containing the top bar and balance card
Content section below has a white or light grey background with rounded top corners
Layout is centered and max-width constrained for comfortable mobile readability on wider screens

constraints: Do not modify files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
All backend logic must remain in backend/main.mo single actor
Existing routes /deposit, /withdraw, /transfer, and /transaction-history must remain functional
Hardcoded login credentials must not be changed
nonGoals: Adding new backend endpoints or changing the data model
Building out Accounts or Payments pages beyond a Coming Soon state
